public class PageMetaData

getCurrentVersion

protected final int getCurrentVersion()
Get the current version.

Note that changes to subclasses as well as to this class will require this value to change and proper handling in the write/read methods.

Specified by:
getCurrentVersion in class PersistablePublishable

readVersion

protected void readVersion(int version,
                           java.io.DataInput dataInput)

Read this message's contents from the dataInput stream that was written by this.write(dataOutput).

NOTE: this requires all implementing classes to have a default constructor with no args.
